channel.title: [ANY SERVER | SUPER EASY] How to add my simplified vote4gold
channel.description:
I think this is the right thread, if it goes somewhere else, I deeply apologize, leave a comment and I'll move it. The server downloads section is mostly for Downloading RSPS Servers, so I didn't add it there, plus this page instructs you briefly on how to use my simple vote4gold system. In my opinion this is the right thread, however I may be wrong.
---
I made a custom vote4gold system. It's more secure than the old one. It's really simple. They put in their username click submit and vote and then it writes their character name to a vote logs file so you can reward them. If you don't want to have to mess with mysql, this is the best thing your gonna get. Sorry I can't make it automatic, but you can't make it automated unless you use mysql. Not everyone knows how to use mysql, so I avoided using it. :P Your welcome ^.^ It's only around 3 files and 1 folder depending on if you give the vote4gold form it's own special page.
How to use: 1.Unzip it with winrar.
2.Go into the new folder, open up vote-2.html, this page comes up after they are done voting. Edit it to your liking(change the message, background color, font color, etc.)
3. If you want you can go into vote.html and change up the form a bit.
4. You don't have to do much on your server, just go into your ::vote command and change the url to your new vote thing. I guess this is a "Server Website Tutorial" Not just a "Server" tutorial, but it still falls under "Server" tutorials. :P
If you think I should pimp out the vote page, tell me in feedback.
I also made a custom Online/Offline server status checker so you don't have to fall back on rlocus status checker. Their status checker is huge and bulky, this one just has a simple transparent backgrounded photo with lime green online or red offline text in the image. I'm probably going to release it later.
For now I call the vote4gold thing "Vote4Gold" Lol, IDK what to call it. Leave ideas in comments. Please give feedback to keep my post alive! :) Also, should I release the status checker?
---
Download files: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/26535423/vote4gold.zip https://dl.dropbox.com/u/26535423/vote4gold.zip https://dl.dropbox.com/u/26535423/vote4gold.zip https://dl.dropbox.com/u/26535423/vote4gold.zip https://dl.dropbox.com/u/26535423/vote4gold.zip

Without a confirmation from both parties (your web server and the voting website), votes can easily be cheated.
[/quote]
Yerp. But most rsps players don’t know that I’m gonna try to find out how to do that.[/quote]
just make it so if you insert username once, you can’t do it again?

item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

I think this is the right thread, if it goes somewhere else, I deeply apologize, leave a comment and I’ll move it. The server downloads section is mostly for Downloading RSPS Servers, so I didn’t add it there, plus this page instructs you briefly on how to use my simple vote4gold system. In my opinion this is the right thread, however I may be wrong.

I made a custom vote4gold system. It’s more secure than the old one. It’s really simple. They put in their username click submit and vote and then it writes their character name to a vote logs file so you can reward them. If you don’t want to have to mess with mysql, this is the best thing your gonna get. Sorry I can’t make it automatic, but you can’t make it automated unless you use mysql. Not everyone knows how to use mysql, so I avoided using it. Your welcome ^.^ It’s only around 3 files and 1 folder depending on if you give the vote4gold form it’s own special page.

How to use:
1.Unzip it with winrar.

2.Go into the new folder, open up vote-2.html, this page comes up after they are done voting. Edit it to your liking(change the message, background color, font color, etc.)

  1. If you want you can go into vote.html and change up the form a bit.

  2. You don’t have to do much on your server, just go into your ::vote command and change the url to your new vote thing. I guess this is a “Server Website Tutorial” Not just a “Server” tutorial, but it still falls under “Server” tutorials.

If you think I should pimp out the vote page, tell me in feedback.

I also made a custom Online/Offline server status checker so you don’t have to fall back on rlocus status checker. Their status checker is huge and bulky, this one just has a simple transparent backgrounded photo with lime green online or red offline text in the image. I’m probably going to release it later.

For now I call the vote4gold thing “Vote4Gold” Lol, IDK what to call it. Leave ideas in comments. Please give feedback to keep my post alive! Also, should I release the status checker?
